original_text: Ishmael also killed all the men of Judah who were with Gedaliah at Mizpah, as well as the Babylonian soldiers who were there.
korean_text: 이스마엘이 또 미스바에서 그다랴와 함께 있던 모든 유다 사람과 거기에 있는 갈대아 군사를 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: Ishmael also killed all the men of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 이스마엘 또한 유다의 모든 남자들을 죽였습니다

sentences.original_text: who were with Gedaliah at Mizpah
as well as the Babylonian soldiers
